author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add layeroffset attribute to 6-inch wafer geometry files for HGCal

#### PR validation:

Tested using the workflows for HGCal TB which uses 6-inch wafer

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx294A Add layeroffset attribute to 6-inch wafer geometry files for HGCal
